message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you take 10%. We can negotiate later if you think it's unfair.
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, given that we both have to deal with the inflation. Let's work together to get a deal!
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 65/35.  I'm open to negotiation if you want to go back and forth a bit more.
